patthana8.70:1.1_0: Napariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca napariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana8.70:2.1_0: Naapariyāpannaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ.
patthana8.70:3.1_0: Napariyāpannañca naapariyāpannañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naapariyāpanno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … ekaṁ. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana8.70:4.1_0: Hetuyā pañca, ārammaṇe dve …pe… avigate pañca.
